可查询。","PageView_RowNo":1},{"ID":7,"Title":"哪里可以使用摩会员卡?","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"0f7c39b0-3ab1-4247-0a39-0df18279a3c2","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:41:51","Status":0,"Remark":"您可在中国大陆地区的任意一家参加摩会员卡活动的门店内使用您的摩会员卡。进入会员中心-适用门店 可查询。","PageView_RowNo":2},{"ID":6,"Title":"会员卡有效期？","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"53b8f08a-74ac-4c96-7993-d92b155e71ec","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:41:38","Status":0,"Remark":"您所办理的摩会员卡一经绑定注册微信服务号【摩提工房集团VIMIU】后，您的会员身份账户永久有效。","PageView_RowNo":3},{"ID":5,"Title":"如何绑定摩会员卡及成为注册微会员?","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"c7e22b0b-03c9-e69c-bfff-59a457475269","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:41:21","Status":0,"Remark":"请在购买摩会员卡后关注摩提工房集团VIMIU微信服务号（vimiu_china）根据指引来完成注册绑定。您一般在1分钟内就可以完成注册，在服务号上成功绑定摩会员卡，即成为微会员，成为微会员可绑定关联多张摩会员卡。路径：会员中心-绑定卡片-添加卡片-输入卡号及卡片背面六位密码-绑定成功","PageView_RowNo":4},{"ID":4,"Title":"会员注册为何收不到验证码？","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"80138c2c-6be9-ea57-238a-a7ec13e23c98","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:41:11","Status":0,"Remark":"请注意在网络信号畅通的环境下进行会员注册，一般在1分钟内您将收到验证码。如您在尝试3次之后仍收不到验证码，可能是由于您的手机之前设置了黑名单过滤短信，可于工作时间周一至周五上午9:00-17:00致电会员服务热线4008892828由专员为您处理解决。","PageView_RowNo":5},{"ID":3,"Title":"会员注册信息如何修改？","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"8ec4bf22-ad53-1854-a3ac-5d5f683e9b07","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:40:55","Status":0,"Remark":"会员生日信息一经提交无法修改。","PageView_RowNo":6},{"ID":2,"Title":"会员卡必须本人使用吗？","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"2d16a8e3-1509-83c3-0034-d0d196a9d2b0","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:40:35","Status":0,"Remark":"摩会员卡限持卡人使用，不得租借或转让。会员应妥善保管实体摩会员卡及密码。任何因保管不善而造成的损失，由持卡人自行承担。","PageView_RowNo":7},{"ID":1,"Title":"如何将新购买的摩会员卡绑定关联到既有的微会员帐户下?","E_Title":null,"IsHot":1,"IsElite":1,"ParentClassTitle":"顶级分类","ParentID":0,"ImageUrlList":"|","FolderName":"ee057855-669b-a0a9-a40e-5d23906c9153","ListTemplate":"","ShowTemplate":"","Sort":0,"DataFlag":"AllowEditAllowCopyAllowDeleteAllowOther","SiteID":0,"IsMakeHtml":0,"SeoTitle":"","SeoKeywords":"","SeoDescription":"","StartTime":"2019-04-28 18:39:53","Status":0,"Remark":"关注微信服务号摩提工房集团VIMIU-会员中心-绑定卡片，按照指引流程，将新购买的摩会员卡绑定到您既有的微会员帐户下，该卡内的资产自动转移到微会员账户下，以方便资产的管理和使用。新卡好礼也将被加入您的该既有帐户中。","PageView_RowNo":8}]
